title: offline meetings meet URL in message body is ignored
body:
**Describe the bug**
Meetings marked non online but with a meet URL embedded in invite message area 
are ignored. Clicking on such link does nothing.
**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

Receive a non online meeting with meet URL in invite msg area:
```
https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_OWFmZDg2NWQtMzYwYS00YWRhLTg5NzEtZ...
```
Click on link to open meeting and noting happens.



**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Gentoo
 - Installation package [ tar.gz ]
 - Version [ all up to and including 1.9.4 ]

**Debug**
```
teams-for-linux --optInTeamsV2 --url=https://teams.microsoft.com/v2 --logConfig={}
No config file found, using default values
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
```

Pasting the URL in chat window and clicking on joins the meeting proper
